headline: Ask HN: How to do a Computer Science PhD part time?
description:
I have a masters degree in CS and I am working in the industry (let’s say one of the FAANG). I have always wanted to PhD, but couldn’t because I had things to take care of.
Now that I have settled in the industry for last few years, I want to do more research. So I have been wondering if there are legit places that provide part time PhD, and if there is any chance that those PhDs can eventually lead to a career in academia (as a professor)?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 如何兼职攻读计算机科学博士？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 如何兼職攻讀計算機科學博士？
description_zh-Hans:
我有一个CS的硕士学位，我在这个行业工作（比方说FAANG中的一个）。我一直想读博士，但因为我有事情要处理，所以没能读。
现在我已经在这个行业工作了几年，我想做更多的研究。所以我一直在想，是否有合法的地方提供兼职博士，以及这些博士是否有可能最终导致在学术界的职业（作为教授）？
